code:
---
config:
  theme: redux
---
flowchart TD
    A1[Infra_WorkerNode] --> A[Infra_IngressController]
    A --> B[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    B -- Memory read successful --> C[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    B -- Memory access error --> D[Infra_RedisCache]
    D --> E[Infra_IngressController]
    E --> F[Infra_WorkerNode]
    C --> G{Infra_RedisCache}
    G -- Yes --> H[Infra_IngressController]
    G -- No --> I[Infra_RedisCache]
    I --> J[Infra_WorkerNode]
    J --> K[Infra_IngressController]
    K --> A
    H --> L{Infra_IngressController}
    L -- Immediate, Implied, Accumulator --> M[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    L -- Zero Page, Indexed, Absolute --> N[Infra_WorkerNode]
    L -- Indirect, Relative --> O[Infra_RedisCache]
    M --> P[Infra_RedisCache]
    N --> Q[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    O --> R[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    P --> S[Infra_IngressController]
    Q --> S
    R --> S
    S --> T{Infra_RedisCache}
    T -- "Arithmetic/Logical - e.g., ADC, AND" --> U[Infra_RedisCache]
    T -- "Load/Store - e.g., LDA, STA" --> V[Infra_RedisCache]
    T -- "Branch - e.g., BEQ, JMP" --> W[Infra_RedisCache]
    T -- "Stack - e.g., PHA, RTS" --> X[Infra_WorkerNode]
    T -- "System - e.g., BRK, RTI" --> Y[Infra_WorkerNode]
    U --> Z[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    V --> Z
    W --> AA[Infra_RedisCache]
    X --> Z
    Y --> AB[Infra_WorkerNode]
    AA -- Met --> AC[Infra_WorkerNode]
    AA --  Not mett --> AD[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    AC --> Z
    AD --> Z
    AB -- Interrupt triggered --> AE[Infra_IngressController]
    AB -- Return from interrupt --> AF[Infra_WorkerNode]
    AE --> AG[Infra_IngressController]
    AF --> Z
    Z --> AH[Infra_IngressController]
    AG --> AH
    AH --> AI{Infra_WorkerNode}
    AI -- "NMI pending - e.g., PPU VBlank" --> AJ[Infra_IngressController]
    AI -- "IRQ pending - e.g., mapper, APU" --> AK[Infra_IngressController]
    AI -- No interrupts --> AL[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    AJ --> AM[Infra_IngressController]
    AK --> AN[Infra_IngressController]
    AL --> AO[Infra_RedisCache]
    AM --> AO
    AN --> AO
    AO --> AP{Infra_WorkerNode}
    AP -- Yes --> AQ[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    AQ --> AR[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    AR --> AS[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    AS --> AT[Infra_RedisCache]
    AT --> AU[Infra_RedisCache]
    AP -- No --> AU
    AU --> A
    style AI stroke:#000000
repo_description: A Nintendo Entertainment System Emulator written in Swift
